exercises.title: Identity-in-Christ Reframe (L1)
exercises.summary: Replace the lie with Scripture-rooted identity.
steps: Write the troubling thought in one sentence.
List evidence for/against.
Choose one identity verse; write a 1-sentence reframe.

scriptureKJV.text: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature...

exercises.prayer: Father, let me live from who I am in Christ.
exercises.petersonAimUp: Aim at truth; identity guides action.

exercises.title: Confession & Truth Step (L1)
exercises.summary: Tell the truth to God and take one concrete step.
steps: Name one thing to confess in one line.
Receive forgiveness by faith; write a single next step.
Schedule the step (today or tomorrow).

scriptureKJV.text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins...

exercises.prayer: Merciful Lord, cleanse me and help me walk in truth.

exercises.title: Serve Someone Today (L1)
exercises.summary: Choose one unseen act of love within 24 hours.
steps: Pick one person and one humble act.
Decide where/when you'll do it (≤24h).
After, log how it affected your mood.
exercises.prayer: Jesus, open my eyes to serve with humility and joy.
exercises.petersonAimUp: Responsibility and love reshape the day.

exercises.title: Scripture Meditation 5m (L1)
exercises.summary: Slow, attentive reading to anchor mind and will.
steps: Read the verse slowly 3 times.
Note one word/phrase that stands out.
What obedience does this invite today?

scriptureKJV.text: I am the way, the truth, and the life...

exercises.prayer: Speak, Lord; I will listen and obey.

exercises.title: Gratitude 3×30s (L1)
exercises.summary: Three half-minute notes of thanks; optional 1-line prayer.
steps: 30s: write one thing you're thankful for.
30s: another—be specific.
30s: one more—name the good source.

scriptureKJV.text: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

exercises.prayer: Thank You, Lord, for these gifts today.
